---
# This file is autogenerated
title: useOnramp
description: Overview of the useOnramp method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/react/hooks/useOnramp
---

Hook to trigger the onramp/funding modal

## Import

```ts
import { useOnramp } from "@account-kit/react";
```

## Usage

```tsx
import { useOnramp } from "@account-kit/react";

function BuyCryptoButton() {
  const { onramp } = useOnramp();

  return <button onClick={() => onramp("USDC", "ethereum")}>Buy USDC</button>;
}
```

## Returns

`UseOnrampResult`
Object containing onramp function and loading state
